edge: The rumor states that during the terrorist attacks on September 11, 2001, a moment of silence was held for the victims. This event is related to the production of the movie as confirmed by director Perry Andelin Blake and actor Dana Carvey, although it actually occurred a few weeks after the attacks.
The movie was still in pre-production on the morning of September 11, 2001.
Filming for the movie was scheduled to begin a couple of weeks after the terrorist attacks on September 11, 2001.
The scene in the Turtle Club was being filmed during the production of the movie.

According to a rumor, Dana Carvey was wearing the full Turtle costume and makeup during the moment of silence for the victims of the terrorist attacks. However, this event actually occurred a few weeks after September 11, 2001.
